title: Lord Sesshomaru's next instalment of stupid happenings.
body:
I am forever posting these random stupid things that happen; getting assists on my own death, Caitlins autos dealing 2225 true damage, LB's Clone dealing 600+ physical damage etc etc.  All remarkably contradictory to RIOT's view of 'in game clarity' here is my next one:

how did veigar get an assist on me? a simple question, just how?
I never saw or felt the effects of event horizon, especially not all the way up in top lane.

replies.body: Did it actually give him an assist? If so this needs to be addressed ASAP.
